title: SAF 2023 ACCREDITATION COMMITTEE ACTIONS
content: Members of the Society of American Foresters (SAF) Committee on Accreditation (COA) met October 24 and 25, 2023 at the SAF National Convention in Sacramento, CA and to review five candidacy requests, three accreditation renewals, and eight progress reports, and substantive change reports for degree programs at 11 colleges and universities. The SAF COAâ€™s 2023 actions are summarized below.
